definition: point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items

sentences.english: It's a tourist place of attraction.
From the above question, why do you consider Antarctica as your tourist destination?
sentences.chinese: 承上題，爲什麼會考慮選擇南極作爲旅遊景點？

sentences.english: A tourist attraction have any off-season and peak seasons.
sentences.chinese: 任何一個旅遊景點都有淡季和旺季之分。

sentences.english: I'll stay four days in Beijing to visit all the famous tourist attractions.
sentences.chinese: 我將在北京住四天，參觀所有著名的旅遊景點。

sentences.english: So the translation of scenic area is getting more important.
sentences.chinese: 因此，旅遊景點的英譯也越發顯得重要。

sentences.english: The Chinese tourist has become a ubiquitous sight from the Grand Canyon to the Grand Palais.
sentences.chinese: 從壯美的峽谷到宏偉的宮殿，中國到處都是旅遊景點。

sentences.english: A tourist spot covered with trash is a real eyesore.
sentences.chinese: 旅遊景點遍地垃圾，總會讓人覺得大煞風景。

sentences.english: Find out more about Myrtle Beach attractions, and real estate.
sentences.chinese: 瞭解更多有關美特爾海灘旅遊景點，房地產等。

sentences.english: Please pay a visit to sights of Suzhou if you are interested in them.
sentences.chinese: 假如有興致，請到蘇州的旅遊景點參觀。

sentences.english: Some small traders at this tourist spot are notorious for their overcharging customers.
sentences.chinese: 這個旅遊景點的一些小商販以宰客而臭名遠揚。

sentences.english: Carefully selected culture venues such as world famous landmarks and tourist interests.
sentences.chinese: 精選文化場所，諸如舉世聞名地標和旅遊景點。

sentences.english: Most of the standard tourist attractions in Manhattan are popular with visiting Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 多數曼哈頓的標準旅遊景點都很受中國遊客的歡迎。

sentences.english: Large-scale recreation ground, tourist scenic spots, Han Dynasty culture development.
sentences.chinese: 大型遊樂場，旅遊景點，漢文化開發。

sentences.english: Johor new mountain Oceania point is a new soft strait built along the tourist attractions.
sentences.chinese: 柔佛新山金海灣是一個沿着新柔海峽而建的旅遊景點。

sentences.english: Crater Lake is a popular sight-seeing spot located in America.
sentences.chinese: 火山口圍着的地方是美國很熱門的旅遊景點。
